block.p: EVERAD, New York, named Angela Pumo chief executive. She was most recently executive vice president at CNX Media Networks.
INTERNATIONAL ASSETS HOLDING CORP. named William C. Dennis Jr. to the post of president and chief operating officer.
EVERAD, New York, named Angela Pumo chief executive. She was most recently executive vice president at CNX Media Networks.
INTERNATIONAL ASSETS HOLDING CORP. named William C. Dennis Jr. to the post of president and chief operating officer.
OPCENTER, New York, named Mary Cirillo chairman and chief executive. She was most recently executive vice president at Deutsche Bank and chief executive at its global institutional services unit.
VIDEOCHIP TECHNOLOGIES, Woodbury, N.Y., named Hector Andres Negroni chief executive. He had been the site general manager at the Honeywell facility in Huntsville, Ala.
